column1: :Tolkien mentions that the name ''[[Fëanor]]'' is a Sindarinized version of the Quenya ''[[Fëanáro]]'',{{fact}} but is not proper Sindarin. His genuine Sindarin name would be ''Faenor'' instead.<ref>{{PM

column2: Fae]]''' is an archaic English word referring to "magic" or "[[fairies]]". This word was used by [[J.R.R. Tolkien
column3: Tolkien]] in the early version of his [[legendarium]] (''[[The Book of Lost Tales Part One]]'') to refer to the [[Valar]] and the [[Elves]].
